fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Choose any player(s) to attack. The maximum possible amount is equal to the current Night's number.
- 1 Use: Next Night, all of your attacks are upgraded to Powerful tier. This won't be refunded if you get roleblocked that night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: If someone successfully kills you with a non-astral attack during the night, you will automatically attack them back.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure that every other player dies. You may win if you're the last player standing or if absolutely everyone dies.
